title: Dynamic star-shaped risk measures and $g$-expectations. (arXiv:2305.02481v1 [q-fin.RM])
abstract: Motivated by the results of static monetary or star-shaped risk measures, the paper investigates the representation theorems in the dynamic framework. We show that dynamic monetary risk measures can be represented as the lower envelope of a family of dynamic convex risk measures, and normalized dynamic star-shaped risk measures can be represented as the lower envelope of a family of normalized dynamic convex risk measures. The link between dynamic monetary risk measures and dynamic star-shaped risk measures are established. Besides, the sensitivity and time consistency problems are also studied. A specific normalized time consistent dynamic star-shaped risk measures induced by $ g $-expectations are illustrated and discussed in detail.

translated_title: 动态星形风险度量与$ g $-期望
translated_abstract: 在静态货币或星形风险度量结果的启发下，本文探讨了动态框架下的表示定理。 我们展示了动态货币风险度量可以表示为一族动态凸风险度量的下包络，而规范化的动态星形风险度量可以表示为一族规范化的动态凸风险度量的下包络。 连接动态货币风险度量和动态星形风险度量之间的关系。 另外，我们还研究了敏感性和时间一致性问题。 我们详细说明并讨论了一种由$g$-期望引出的具有规范化的时间一致性的动态星形风险度量。
tldr: 本文探讨了动态框架下的动态货币风险度量和规范化动态星形风险度量与动态凸风险度量之间的关系，并研究了其敏感性和时间一致性问题。介绍了一种具有规范化的时间一致性的动态星形风险度量，它是由$g$-期望引出的。
en_tdlr: This paper explores the relationship between dynamic monetary risk measures and normalized dynamic star-shaped risk measures with dynamic convex risk measures in a dynamic framework. Sensitivity and time consistency issues are also studied. A specific normalized time consistent dynamic star-shaped risk measure induced by $g$-expectations is illustrated and discussed in detail.
